name: Ghosty´s Chase Prologue
description: Ghosty´s Chase is a point and click adventure where you play a small mute ghost. Ghosty has his first  day at his job as a cleaner. His task is to clean the big mansion of the Lord. Yet when he started cleaning he found a mysterious letter. Without knowing what he is getting himself into he takes the letter with him and travels through the country to bring it to his rightful owner, the King.
